author: dildick
body: The Phase-1 upgrade of CSC TPG includes new ALCT, CLCT and TMB algorithms for ME1/1. Setters and getters were added to update the params in the DB. Clarification: CSCs other than ME1/1 will not be upgraded for Phase-1. ME2/1, ME3/1 and ME4/1 will also be upgraded for Phase-2 (not included in this pull request).
title: Phase-1 interface to store L1 CSC TPG params in DB
